Topic.Title: Failed to Load Game after Quest Update

Posts.EditableText:
Hey I installed the new Quest program and my files are refusing to load.  I'm getting the following Error Message:

*Invalid XML: For security reasons DTD is prohibited in this XML document.  To enable DTD processing set the DtdProcessing property on XmlReaderSettings to Parse and pass the settings into XmlReader.Create method.
Posts.HTML:
Hey I installed the new Quest program and my files are refusing to load. I'm getting the following Error Message:

*Invalid XML: For security reasons DTD is prohibited in this XML document. To enable DTD processing set the DtdProcessing property on XmlReaderSettings to Parse and pass the settings into XmlReader.Create method.

Posts.EditableText: I also re-installed a few of Mr. Pixie's libraries, too, ConvLib and ShopLib.  I did manage to open a few of the games I was working on until I re-installed the libraries (put them in the same place as last time and over-wrote the originals) so that's most likely the culprit.  Not sure how to fix it, though.
Posts.HTML: I also re-installed a few of Mr. Pixie's libraries, too, ConvLib and ShopLib. I did manage to open a few of the games I was working on until I re-installed the libraries (put them in the same place as last time and over-wrote the originals) so that's most likely the culprit. Not sure how to fix it, though.

Posts.EditableText: Fixed.  I had right-click downloaded on the links in the tutorials, rather than clicking through and Right Clicking the RAW file.  For some reason that made all the difference!
Posts.HTML: Fixed. I had right-click downloaded on the links in the tutorials, rather than clicking through and Right Clicking the RAW file. For some reason that made all the difference!
